short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension for UM Students to help them organize their important school-related bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of remembering the website names for all the different sites needed in your classes? Mad that your bookmarks bar is being inflated by Ctools, Wolverine Access, etc...? Then this extension will be of great use to you! I present 'Wolverine Links", A straightforward and intuitive extension that makes managing your online UofM accounts a breeze! 

This is an extension that organizes the most important links necessary to all University of Michigan students. Offering  complete customization and a fluid, easy-to-follow interface with visual representations for each important site. 

If you have a suggestion or there is a website that you would like to see added, please email me at wtesler@umich.edu

Update 1.2.5:
Law School
University Club
